## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATCHIP, CHIP</u>
- **Gene Name:** CARBOXYL TERMINUS OF HSC70-INTERACTING PROTEIN, carboxyl terminus of HSC70-interacting protein
- **Description:**   carboxyl terminus of HSC70-interacting protein;(source:Araport11)

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_059253C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Seedlings screened in bulk via high throughput methods for responses to various stressors. Results  are in comparison to Col-0.heat:no change,cold:no change,oxidative stress:decreased,osmotic stress:no change,salt stress:increased,ABA:no change,hypoxia:no change.
